PCR.name: PCR
PCR.description: Power Control PCR must not change from power-down request (pdn_req) assertion until the target subsystem is completely powered up

enumeratedValues.name: PCR_0
enumeratedValues.description: Do not switch off power even if pdn_req is asserted.

enumeratedValues.name: PCR_1
enumeratedValues.description: Switch off power when pdn_req is asserted.

MEGA_PUPSCR.name: MEGA_PUPSCR
MEGA_PUPSCR.description: PGC Mega Power Up Sequence Control Register

SW.name: SW
SW.description: After a power-up request (pup_req assertion), the PGC waits a number of IPG clocks equal to the value of SW before asserting power toggle on/off signal (switch_b) to switch on power

SW2ISO.name: SW2ISO
SW2ISO.description: After asserting power toggle on/off signal (switch_b) to switch on power, the PGC waits a number of IPG clocks equal to the value of SW2ISO before negating isolation

MEGA_PDNSCR.name: MEGA_PDNSCR
MEGA_PDNSCR.description: PGC Mega Pull Down Sequence Control Register

ISO.name: ISO
ISO.description: After a power-down request (pdn_req assertion), the PGC waits a number of IPG clocks equal to the value of ISO before asserting isolation

ISO2SW.name: ISO2SW
ISO2SW.description: After asserting isolation, the PGC waits a number of IPG clocks equal to the value of ISO2SW before negating power toggle on/off signal (switch_b) to switch off power

MEGA_SR.name: MEGA_SR
MEGA_SR.description: PGC Mega Power Gating Controller Status Register

enumeratedValues.name: PSR_0
enumeratedValues.description: The target subsystem was not powered down for the previous power-down request.

enumeratedValues.name: PSR_1
enumeratedValues.description: The target subsystem was powered down for the previous power-down request.
